# UIMenu.Options

**Structure**

Options you use to configure a menu’s appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Options
```

## Options

- **displayInline**: An option indicating the menu displays inline with its parent menu instead of displaying as a submenu.
- **destructive**: An option indicating the menu’s appearance represents a destructive action.
- **singleSelection**: An option indicating whether the menu and its submenus allow a single menu item that’s in the “on” state.
- **displayAsPalette**: An option indicating the menu displays as a row of menu elements for choosing from a collection of items.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a menu options structure from data in an unarchiver.

## Creating a menu object

- **init(title:image:identifier:options:children:)**: Creates a new menu with the specified values.
- **init(title:subtitle:image:identifier:options:children:)**: Creates a new menu with the specified title, subtitle, image, identifier, menu options, and child elements.
- **init(title:subtitle:image:identifier:options:preferredElementSize:children:)**: Creates a new menu with the specified title, subtitle, image, identifier, menu options, element size, and child elements.
- **UIMenu.Identifier**: Constants you use to identify an app’s standard menus.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a menu from data in an unarchiver.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
